item.description:
Join Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on this Ultimate African Safari to the Serengeti in Tanzania!

This 9 day group safari tour to The Serengeti and Ngorongoro Crater will travel February 18, 2012.

Considered by many to be one of life’s great adventures, an African safari through the world famous national parks of Tanzania is a trip that simply can’t be missed. On this exciting group adventure, you will join other like-minded adventure travelers and together experience plenty of opportunities for big game viewing and to take in the vast and incredible natural attractions of Tanzania, including the world-famous Serengeti National Park and the breathtaking Ngorongoro Crater.

Check out the gallery from the last African Safari club group tour

Price: $3,299 plus international airfare (NO Single Supplement charge unless you specifically request a single room to yourself)

For details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com  

(NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip)

 

Included in this adventure:

*Fully guided safari through some of Africa's greatest national parks: Serengeti, Ngorongoro Crater, Lake Eyasi, and Lake Manyara

  

*Comfortable 4x4 Land Cruiser type vehicles with open viewing roof

 

*All accommodations in excellent mid-range safari hotels and comfortable tent camps (with in-tent shower and toilet)

 

*Visit to an active Masai Mara village

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTE: Space is limited and on a first come first served basis. If you’ve always wanted to experience the Ultimate African Safari, then be sure to book your place early!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club : an international adventure travel club with over 12,000+ members. The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures . For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

 

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com

Phone: 1.617.645.7689

 

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World®
item.name: The Ultimate African Safari - Serengeti & Ngorongoro Crater - 9 Days
